unnormalised: Hey guys, return policies can be tricky, right? I remember buying a saree online from Jaipur right before Diwali. It was beautiful in the pictures, but totally different in person. Luckily, they had a good return policy! Otherwise, I'd be stuck with a saree I couldn't wear. Clear return policies are important, especially for festive seasons! Must be easier than getting good biryani recipe from Amma!
